synopsis.text: She athed in mystery and pursued by the ruthless Garubado Empire, a young girl named Miu finds herself in the company of an aspiring swordsman, Sadie, after he discovers her in a forest, devoid of memories and clothing. Unbeknownst to them, Miu is the embodiment of a formidable weapon, capable of summoning the mighty Dragoon power. As the empire relentlessly hunts for their lost asset, Sadie vows to protect Miu and help unravel the enigma surrounding her existence, memory loss, and extraordinary abilities. In their perilous journey, they will confront treacherous royalty, bloodthirsty killers, and the dark secrets behind Miu's connection to an evil plan that could bring forth devastating consequences.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
